entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Elk Island (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:18 a.m. MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 8:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: WSW calm km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
